Trello Updates iOS App with URL Scheme Support

May 27, 2014
1 minute read

Awesome productivity tool Trello (which I’ve mentioned before) released an update to its iOS app today. Among many great new features is functionality that I’ve wanted for some time: URL scheme support.

All the juicy details can be found on the Trello iOS App board. It’s early, but all the functionality you’d want in a first release is there:

  • Showing boards
  • Creating boards
  • Creating boards
  • Creating cards

Giddy joy! I will be working to update my URL Actions for iOS guide with all the relevant productivity uses I find. Stay tuned!
